tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_pledge_texts; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_pledge_texts AS SELECT p.id AS pledge_id, pt.title AS name, 999999999 AS team_id, 'Undefined' AS team_name, 999999999 AS creator_id, 'Undefined' AS creator_name, 999999999 AS modifier_id,'Undefined' AS modifier_name, 999999999 AS approver_id, 'Undefined' AS approver_name FROM amp_funding_pledges p LEFT JOIN v_pledges_titles pt ON pt.pledge_id = p.id;
